text: Dhugumatti, isaan kafaranii, karaa Rabbiitiifi masjiida kabajamaa isa namoota ishee (Makkaan) keessa jiraataniifi biyyoota biraa irraa dhufaniif wal qixa goone irraa (namoota) dhorgan, (hoongaâ€™an)Nama ishee keessatti sababa miidhaatiin jallachuu fedhes adabbii laalessaa irraa isa dhandhamsiifna
